section.title: Introduction
section.para:
The BioPreDyn project aims at standardizing the data regression process in systems biology. After the requirements detailed in the
integrated software suite requirements guide, SED-ML was chosen as a representation for such a work flow.
In order to be as user-friendly as possible, deliverables 7.2 / 3.4 / 8.3 need to be given a graphical user interface. This document describes the requirements for such a graphical user interface.
